title: Cocktail
creator_credit: Roger Donaldson, Robert W. Court, Ted Field, Interscope, Silver Screen Partners and Touchstone
brief_description: When a young confident and ambitious bartender moves to Jamaica he meets an artist and their romance brings a new perspective to his self-centred life. Stars Tom Cruise and Bryan Brown.
